title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 3.1 - Records available to the public
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 3.1 - Records available to the public

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by the Banking Law, Financial

Services Law, Insurance Law, Public Officers Law section 87(2), or other
provision of law, all records of the department shall be made available to the
public in accordance with Public Officers Law Article 6, known as the Freedom
of Information Law ("FOIL"). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register May 20, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 20, eff. 5/20/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
